Package com.github.jnstockley

Class Logging

java.lang.Object
com.github.jnstockley.Logging
public class Logging extends Object
Helps with logging all messages to the log file and clear the log when needed
Version:
1.6
Author:
Jack Stockley

      Parameters:
      className - The name of the file the message if from
      message - The exception thrown that is being logged
